item.title: VCR+/VideoPlus - The Video Timer Thingy
item.description:
Remember VideoPlus aka VCR+? Those codes that you used to find in newspapers and listings magazines to program your video recorder?

This is based on this video which was uploaded to my channel 25 March 2025.

Is it true VCR+ was invented because a mathematics professor couldn’t set his VCR to record a baseball game?

Yes, that’s entirely true. You can even watch Henry Yuen (the co-inventor) discussing the very matter on the Charlie Rose TV programme back in 2002.
